HelpInfo.Entry: The worker menu allows you to change what type of jobs your worker will work on! The 4 roles are general, crafter, gardener, and synthesizer.
You can move around the world using WASD. You can zoom in and out using the Z/X keys. When building use left click to place and right click to destroy.
Congrats on starting your first space station! Check the goals menu to see your first task. Good Luck!

Space rock appears randomly throughout the world. One can obtain it by using the mine space rock tool (in the actions menu). Once you have it, you can use the workbench to turn it into steel to build walls, metal floors, etc.

The workbench allows you to craft more complex things. To craft, use the manufacture menu. Once you click craft, a worker will begin to work on that task. Note: The workbench only works on craftable things. Dirt/Unobtainium require other machines.
Compressors add oxygen to your space station. Note: The room the compressor is in must be enclosed (with walls and floors) or else the oxygen will vent into space.
Saplings need three things to grow: oxygen, dirt, and space. Saplings require a 3x3 area (centered on the sapling) to grow.
Dead plants form when plants (saplings, potatoes, etc.) fail to survive in their environment. To grow, plants need oxygen (at least 15%) and dirt floors.

Gather steel so that you can start your base. You can collect steel by mining space rock. To mine rock, use the mining tool in the actions menu. Once you have space rock, you can use the workbench, to craft steel.
Gather copper so that you can build more advanced blocks. Similar to steel, you can collect steel by mining space rock and using the workbench,

Grow potatoes so that your worker can eat. To grow potatoes, you need to place potatoes plants (in the block menu) on a dirt floor. In order for the plants to grow, they must have oxygen. To get oxygen, use the compressor block. Note: The room must be enclosed (with walls/airlocks and floors) or else the oxygen will escape!

Compost leaves to create 8 bags of dirt. You can use the composter to compost leaves. To collect leaves, you can grow trees, and then use the cut tree tool in the actions menu. Trees need a 3x3 area (centered on the sapling) to grow.
Now that you have space dust, you can use the synthesizer to create unobtainium. Because synthesizing takes so long, it will take your workers multiple sessions to synthesize one piece.
Using dust collectors, collect one piece of space dust. Eventually, you will be able to use the " + "space dust to synthesize unobtainium
Power ingots are used for fuel in the arc reactor. Power ingots are created in a similar method to unobtainium. Using the synthesizer, workers can convert space dust into new elements!
Arc Reactors are the most powerful generators ever built. They use power ingots, a rare and complex material, to generate immense amounts of power (50 times more energy than a solar panel).
To collect wood, you can grow trees, and then use the cut tree tool in the actions menu. Trees need a 3x3 area (centered on the sapling) and oxygen to grow.
